original_title: Sister Hazel: A Life in the Day
overview: Fan-friendly rockers Sister Hazel are the subject of this great up-close-and-personal look at the band. Packed with behind-the-scenes documentary footage, interviews with band members and an entire live concert from the House of Blues in Orlando, Florida, the documentary also includes a bonus for truly insatiable fans: a tour of Sister Hazel's hometown.
title: Sister Hazel: A Life in the Day
